sources.name: Employees
sources.description: Source employees file, changes every day
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employees

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.description: Current rows in DimEmployees DW table
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployees

sinks.name: sinkNew
sinks.script:
SetAttrsForNew sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize:50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkNew

sinks.name: sinkUpdates
sinks.script:
SetAttrsUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize:50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkUpdates

sinks.name: sinkInactive
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize:50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EmpID'],
	mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		EndDt,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkInactive

transformations.name: TypeConversionsAndTimestamp
transformations.script:
NullFilter derive(EmpID = toInteger(EmpID),
		processtime = currentTimestamp()) ~> TypeConversionsAndTimestamp

transformations.name: LookupIDs
transformations.script:
TypeConversionsAndTimestamp, TypeConversions lookup(TypeConversionsAndTimestamp@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupIDs

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
NormNames split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)

transformations.name: checkForChanges
transformations.script:
NameNorm2, TypeConversions exists(NameNorm2@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> checkForChanges

transformations.name: NormNames
transformations.script:
LookupIDs select(mapColumn(
		EmpID = TypeConversionsAndTimestamp@EmpID,
		RegionCode = Employees@RegionCode,
		StatusCode = Employees@StatusCode,
		FunctionCode = Employees@FunctionCode,
		GradeLevel = Employees@GradeLevel,
		RoleCode = Employees@RoleCode,
		StartDt = Employees@StartDt,
		EndDt = Employees@EndDt,
		iscurrent,
		processtime = TypeConversionsAndTimestamp@processtime
	))~> NormNames

transformations.name: InactiveFields
transformations.script:
SetAttrsInactive select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		EndDt,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	))~> InactiveFields

transformations.name: NullFilter
transformations.description: Filter out NULLs from source file

transformations.name: NameNorm2
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		RegionCode,
		StatusCode,
		FunctionCode,
		GradeLevel,
		RoleCode,
		StartDt,
		EndDt,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	))~> NameNorm2
